amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in House Report 115-830 to strike section 430, which allows a loophole in Federal water quality permitting requirements for pollution discharges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Beyer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.
